name: Hashtag-photowall
author: AlluaTech

sections.description:
Do you know including User Generated Content (UGC) can effectively increase the engagement of your visitors?

Our hashtag photo wall is a very simple and straight forward to use wordpress plug-in which helps you to crate UGC in a few clicks. You can create a photo wall on your website by instagram hashtag and play around with your photos.

Have fun creating UGC! And please let us know if you have any questions: consultant@alluatech.com
sections.installation:
There is a tutorial in http://hk.allua.co/wordpress_photowall/index.php/tutorial/This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
Read http://hk.allua.co/wordpress_photowall/index.php/tutorial/ first.

Please let us know if you have any questions: consultant@alluatech.com
